channel.title: Module on htr3n's
channel.link:
https://htr3n.github.io/tags/module/Recent content in Module on htr3n'sHugo -- gohugo.ioenThis work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.Fri, 16 Feb 2018 00:00:00 +0000 Getting started with Webpackhttps://htr3n.github.io/2018/02/getting-started-webpack/Fri, 16 Feb 2018 00:00:00 +0000https://htr3n.github.io/2018/02/getting-started-webpack/

Per definition here, Webpack is a static module bundler for Web applications. It analyses and processes the input application and generates output bundles. The design of Webpack architecture is highly modularised and extendable. In this post, I share here some notes on major aspects of Webpack since I’ve started learning it.
